Lecturer, researcher, ally, living with MS My research interests include autism, gender identity, education, social justice, inclusion and intersectionality (this list is not exhaustive).  My doctoral research focused on the lived educational experience of autistic trans and non-binary students in the Republic of Ireland.  #actuallyautistic #participatoryresearch #autism #genderidentity #multiplesclerosis

Hello Mastodon, I am a retired #gifted and #special educator in #Colorado living the dream in the #mountains. I enjoy my #doodles, Loki and Elske, #sewing, and the #outdoors. #Organic Gardening is a passion, especially in growing strawberries, blackberries, and raspberries. I made freezer jam this year and oh, so good.
